quotes.message: If there's a single lesson that life teaches us, it's that wishing doesn't make it so.
quotes.name: Lev Grossman

quotes.message: Every man desires to live long, but no man wishes to be old.
quotes.name: Jonathan Swift

quotes.message: Everyone wishes that the man whom he fears would perish.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: I wish for sorrow to be a full stop and happiness to be a comma in my life.
quotes.name: Luffina Lourduraj

quotes.message: A wise woman wishes to be no one's enemy; a wise woman refuses to be anyone's victim.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: No one is perfect and everyone wishes they could change something about themselves.
quotes.name: Julia Jones

quotes.message: It is hard to contend against one's heart's desire; for whatever it wishes to have it buys at the cost of soul.
quotes.name: Heraclitus

quotes.message: May you find grace to do what needs to be done.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: May the forces of evil become confused on the way to your house.
quotes.name: George Carlin

quotes.message: A tough lesson in life that one has to learn is that not everybody wishes you well.
quotes.name: Dan Rather

quotes.message: There's no point having wishes if you don't at least try to do them.
quotes.name: Sally Nicholls

quotes.message: How sleep the brave, who sink to rest, By all their country's wishes blest!
quotes.name: William Collins

quotes.message: When envoys are sent with compliments in their mouths, it is a sign that the enemy wishes for a truce.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: Good wishes alone will not ensure peace.
quotes.name: Alfred Nobel

quotes.message: Selfishness is not living as one wishes to live, it is asking others to live as one wishes to live.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Man is free at the moment he wishes to be.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: I'm not that rebellious. There's a part of me that wishes I was that.
quotes.name: Miranda Cosgrove

quotes.message: If you have one wish, wish for everything to be exactly as it is. Then wait patiently for your wish to come true.
quotes.name: Stephen Russell

quotes.message: Every girl wishes she was Juliet in some version of their life.
quotes.name: Hailee Steinfeld

quotes.message: But darling, I wish you well On your way to the wishing well
quotes.name: Patty Griffin

quotes.message: You should never wish for wishful thinking.
quotes.name: Rachel Cohn

quotes.message: With persistent prayer, the desired wish shall be fulfilled.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: A man of the world must seem to be what he wishes to be thought.
quotes.name: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.message: Whoever wishes peace among peoples must fight statism.
quotes.name: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.message: My best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: When you wish someone joy, you wish them peace, love, prosperity, happiness. All the good things.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Diligence is the mother of good fortune, and idleness, its opposite, never brought a man to the goal of any of his best wishes.
quotes.name: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.message: A wise unselfishness is not a surrender of yourself to the wishes of anyone, but only to the best discoverable course of action.
quotes.name: David Seabury

quotes.message: That is ever the way. Tis all jealousy to the bride and good wishes to the corpse.
quotes.name: James M. Barrie

quotes.message: You can want and want and want, but if he doesn't want you back. You might as well wish the sky were red.
quotes.name: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.message: The wish for healing has always been half of health.
quotes.name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.message: You will know that forgiveness has begun when you recall those who hurt you and feel the power to wish them well.
quotes.name: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.message: To do nothing evil is good; to wish nothing evil is better.
quotes.name: Claudius

quotes.message: If you wish to forget anything on the spot, make a note that this thing is to be remembered.
quotes.name: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.message: He that humbleth himself wishes to be exalted.
quotes.name: Nietzsche

quotes.message: If you wish to succeed in life, make perseverance your bosom friend.
quotes.name: Joseph Addison

quotes.message: Don't wish it was easier wish you were better. Don't wish for less problems wish for more skills. Don't wish for less challenge wish for more wisdom.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Decide that you want it more than you're afraid of it.
quotes.name: Bill Cosby

quotes.message: If we wish ourselves to be high, we should treat that which is over us as high.
quotes.name: Anthony Trollope

quotes.message: we wish to make rage into a fire that cooks things rather than a fire of conflagration.
quotes.name: Clarissa Pinkola Estes

quotes.message: Secretly, we wish anyone we love will think exactly the way we do.
quotes.name: Kim Chernin

quotes.message: I wish you to become who you Â­were born to be. To become queen.
quotes.name: Sarah J. Maas

quotes.message: Our wishes are presentiments of the abilities that lie in us, harbingers of what we will be able to accomplish.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
